statements: GRANT SELECT ON Utilities.categories TO user1;
GRANT INSERT ON Utilities.products TO user2;
GRANT UPDATE(name,category_id) ON Utilities.products TO user3;
GRANT SELECT ON utilities.electricity_meters TO admin;
GRANT INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON utilities.water_meters TO operator;
GRANT SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE ON utilities.bill_payments TO accountant;
GRANT SELECT ON utilities.electricity_meters TO analytics_team;
GRANT INSERT, SELECT ON utilities.water_meters TO billing_team;
GRANT UPDATE, DELETE ON utilities.gas_meters TO maintenance_team;
GRANT SELECT, INSERT ON Tool TO user1
GRANT UPDATE(name), DELETE(description) ON Tool TO user2
GRANT SELECT(name, description), UPDATE(quantity) ON Tool TO user3
